name: Just HTML
description: HTML is the standard markup language for creating Web pages.

name: JSX
description: JSX is a syntax extension to JavaScript. It is similar to a template language, but it has full power of JavaScript.

name: EJS
description: EJS is a simple templating language that lets you generate HTML markup with plain JavaScript.

name: Pug
description: Pug is a high performance template engine heavily influenced by Haml and implemented with JavaScript for Node.js and browsers.

name: Handlebars
description: Handlebars provides the power necessary to let you build semantic templates effectively with no frustration.

name: Go Templating
description: Go's templating language is based on the template/HTML format used in the C programming language.

name: Liquid
description: Liquid is a template language created by Shopify and written in Ruby. It is the backbone of Shopify themes and is used to load dynamic content on storefronts.

name: Twig
description: Twig is a modern template engine for PHP.

name: XSLT
description: XSLT is a language for transforming XML documents into other XML documents. It is a W3C Recommendation.
